title: Welsh Translation required
h1: A oes gennych rif tystysgrif ACAS ar gyfer
linkText: Acas early conciliation service(opens in new tab) - Requires Update

acasCert.required: Tell us if you have an Acas early conciliation number for Respondent - Requires Update

acasCertNum.required: Tell us if you have an Acas early conciliation number for Respondent - Requires Update
acasCertNum.invalidAcasNumber: Enter Acas number in correct format. For example R123456/12/34 - Requires Update
